cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1 FATAL_ERROR)

set(PROJECT glad)
set(SOURCES src/glad.cpp)

set(PROJECT_PATH ${THIRD_PARTY_PATH}/${PROJECT})

project(${PROJECT})
add_library(${PROJECT} ${SOURCES})

target_include_directories(${PROJECT} PRIVATE include)

set_target_properties(${PROJECT} PROPERTIES 
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_PATH}
	LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_PATH}
	RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_PATH})

set(THIRD_PARTY_INCLUDE_DIRS ${THIRD_PARTY_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
	${PROJECT_PATH}/include 
	PARENT_SCOPE)
set(THIRD_PARTY_LIBS ${THIRD_PARTY_LIBS} 
	${PROJECT_PATH}/lib${PROJECT}.a 
	PARENT_SCOPE)
